incidents.name: Duplicate Zendesk Tickets Coming in From Multiple Customers

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue in Zendesk that causes multiples open tickets and are working to implement a fix. During this time please refrain from submitting multiple tickets for the same issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue in Zendesk that causes multiples open tickets and are working to implement a fix. During this time please refrain from submitting multiple tickets for the same issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Disruption to Emails Sent via Verify and Flex Messaging

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved. Email deliveries for both Verify and Flex Messaging is operating normally.

Our engineering team has mitigated the issues impacting email sending. The Bounce Suppression list has been re-enabled, and email traffic is now fully operational with all systems functioning as expected. Email deliveries for both Verify and Flex Messaging have recovered. We will provide another update within 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available on a full recovery.

Our engineers have mitigated the issues affecting Email Sending and have also re-enabled our Bounce Suppressions list. Email traffic is now working 100% with all checks. Verify and Flex Messaging email sends have also recovered. We will provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available on a full recovery.

Our engineers have mitigated the issues affecting Email Sending and have also re-enabled our Bounce Suppressions list. Email traffic is now working 100% with all checks. Verify and Flex Messaging email sends have also recovered. We will provide an update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available on a full recovery.

We have remediated the issue causing disruption to email sends via Verify and Flex Messaging. We will continue to monitor and will share another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have remediated the issue causing disruption to email sends via Verify and Flex Messaging. We will continue to closely monitor. We will share another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to remediate the issue causing disruption to email sending across Verify and Flex Messaging. We have deployed a fix and are noticing recovery in mail sending functionality. We will continue to work to resolve this. We will provide an update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue where customers are experiencing a complete disruption of email sending across Verify and Flex Messaging. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide an update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue where customers are experiencing a complete disruption of email sending across Verify and Flex Messaging. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide an update in 15 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue where customers are experiencing a complete disruption of email sending functionality across all clusters. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Automated Alert: No Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the potential issue with the Conversations API triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with the Conversations API, where it is experiencing a consumer offset issue where message consumers are 10k-40k offsets behind and not dropping. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing voice quality Issues from Canadian Network Subscribers to a Subset of Twilio's Numbers. This incident has been resolved.
We are no longer experiencing voice quality Issues from Canadian Network Subscribers to a Subset of Twilio's Numbers. This incident has been resolved.

We have started seeing recovery for voice quality Issues from Canadian Network Subscribers to a Subset of Twilio's Numbers. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing a potential issue with poor call quality on calls from Canadian Network Subscribers to a subset of Twilio's phone numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential Voice Quality Issues from Canadian Network Subscribers to a Subset of Twilio's Numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
